directions: Place rice, water, sesame oil, chicken bouillon, olive oil, green onion, garlic and ginger in a rice cooker. Stir, and then place chicken thigh on top. Turn on rice cooker.
When the rice is done, mix the rice so that the oil will be evenly mixed with the rice. Serve.
ingredients: 1 (2 inch) piece fresh ginger root, crushed
title: Garlic Chicken Fragrant Rice On a Budget
